alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 11:57PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG NEAR LAKE SUPERIOR EARLY THIS MORNING... Locally dense fog is expected near Lake Superior overnight, from Grand Portage to Duluth, MN to Saxon Harbor, WI. This includes the North Shore, Twin Ports, and portions of northwest Wisconsin along and north of US Highway 2. Visibility will be variable from location to location and may be less than 1/4 mile at times. The fog will remain limited to areas within a several miles of the shore through 2 AM, but may expand farther inland later overnight. People traveling Minnesota Highway 61 in the Arrowhead, Interstate 35 near Duluth, the bridges between Duluth and Superior, US Highway 53 between Duluth and Hawthorne, WI, US Highway 2 between Superior and Maple, WI and between Ashland and Ironwood, MI, and Wisconsin Highway 13 between Superior and Ashland should be prepared for changing visibility. Be ready to reduce your speed and increase your following distance. Ensure your headlights are on.
